thread.title: Missouri student section successfully annoys John Calipari with chant
thread.title_full: Missouri student section successfully annoys John Calipari with chant

author: Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY
title: Missouri student section successfully annoys John Calipari with chant
text:
Kentucky Wildcats head coach John Calipari reacts during the game against the LSU Tigers in the second half at Rupp Arena. Kentucky defeated LSU 92-85.   (Photo: Mark Zerof-USA TODAY Sports) 
The Mizzou student section was fired up during halftime of the Kentucky vs. Missouri game as the Wildcats held just a one-point 31-30 lead, and they could be heard loud and clear while Kentucky coach John Calipari was interviewed on the court.
Best halftime interview of the season pic.twitter.com/KXuwMkU3TS 
— Mike Rutherford (@CardChronicle) February 22, 2017 The students shouted "Cal you suck! Cal you suck! Cal you suck!" as Calipari talked about how awful his team was playing.
But then, after the coach was asked about the student section, he walked away and cut the interview short. That's how you know he was definitely annoyed … slash he did not want to say anything bad that might get him in trouble.
Deep breaths, just walk away. 
(H/T The Big Lead )
